mapper.insert: insert into b_application_form (id, application_form_number, applicant_name, applicant_id, applicant_country, issue_date, total_amount, customs_confirm_amount) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicantCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{customsConfirmAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update b_application_form set application_form_number = #{applicationFormNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant_name = #{applicantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant_id = #{applicantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant_country = #{applicantCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issue_date = #{issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, customs_confirm_amount = #{customsConfirmAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, application_form_number, applicant_name, applicant_id, applicant_country, issue_date, total_amount, customs_confirm_amount from b_application_form where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, application_form_number, applicant_name, applicant_id, applicant_country, issue_date, total_amount, customs_confirm_amount from b_application_form
